response.skills: AutoCAD, Engineering, Microsoft Office, C++, Spanish, English, Project Management, Microsoft Excel, Process Engineering, Technical Translation, Business Analysis, Requirements Gathering, BPMN, Organization Skills, Time Management, Virtual Office, Business Planning

profile_positions.description:
Dec-2022 - Till now (Apr-2023) - Product Owner, EPAM Systems
Customer: EPAM Systems, Inc :This project was aimed to strengthen technical and business knowledge in composable banking by developing proof of concept apps. These apps served to demonstrate the newly obtained abilities and open new business opportunities.

Project Roles: Product Owner at CAMI Team

Responsibilities:
●	Managed the product backlog.
●	Specified user stories.
●	Conducted refinement sessions.
●	Collaborated on a daily basis with the product team to find and solve possible business gaps.
●	Guided new team members through the product being developed.
●	Supported the English-Spanish translation process for a product interface.
Tools and Technologies: Jira, MS Office 365, MS teams, SCRUM

Aug-2022 - Nov 2022 - Business Analyst, EPAM Systems
Customer: EPAM Systems, Inc
Plus Platform - Collect requirements for Corporate Hackathon Portal

Responsibilities:

●	Interviewed Past Coding challenges stakeholders. 
●	Collected and analyzed pain points of the then current platform. 
●	Actively participated in the formulation of an enhanced user flow, detailing the different activities performed by each user role during a Hackathon Event.
●	Formulated a list of Features with their corresponding user stories.
●	Formulated recommendations to improve the then current product.
Tools and Technologies: Miró, MS Office 365, MS teams
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
02/2021 - 05/2022 Great Minds PBC
Project Description: A Digital platform covering the complete flow of the educational process.
Responsibilities:
•	Worked on the team responsible for tasking students with assignments and assessments and assessing their performance
•	Elicited requirements, undertook change management and aligned the team with client's needs.
•	Created and tracked User Stories and Epics.
•	Led Scrum events: Refinements, Dailies and sprint plannings.
•	Participated in Project Increment Planning by defining objectives for the upcoming quarter.
•	Managed product and sprint backlogs.
•	Led estimation, functional walkthroughs and demonstration sessions.
•	Interacted with sister teams to address dependencies.
•	Collaborated with UX team and the P.O to define prototypes and mock-ups needed for new features.
•	Classified accessibility findings of the product for future resolution.
•	Took part in bug triage.

09/2019 - 01/-2021 
Customer: Internal Project
Project Description: Developing and integrating several mini projects at the administrative level of the company.
Responsibilities:
•	Gathered the requirements for each internal user.
•	Defined, created, decomposed and tracked user stories and epics for each micro project.
•	Led estimation, functional walkthroughs and demonstration sessions.
•	Led Scrum events: User stories refinements, sprint planning and Dailies.
•	Managed stakeholders from different internal customers to ensure each one of the micro projects were developed in accordance with internal customer needs.
•	Led the migration process from Scrum to Kanban.

08/2019 - 09/2019 Southwest Airlines: Migrate the customer from their aging legacy ticket issuing system to a more efiicient solution.
Responsibilities:
●	Participated in regular scrum events such as user stories refinements, sprint planning, functional walkthroughs, Sprint retrospectives, Stand-up daily meetings.
●	Verified and updated the Knowledge Base of the team he was assigned to.
profile_positions.title: Bussiness Analyst

profile_positions.description:

•	Consolidate, Report and Update the acquisition needs – Services and goods - of the Human Resources Department.
•	Generate certifications employees and former employees of the entity

profile_positions.description:
•	Create and modify engineering drafts at customer facilities by applying metrology knowledge and CAD software.
•	Contrasting the location of the equipment installed at customer facilities vs projected location
•	Provide customer support over the drafts issued.
profile_positions.title: Drafter

company.name: Globant
company.description:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves to create a way forward and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design and engineering meet scale.

- We have more than 27,000 employees and we are present in 25 countries working for companies like Google, Rockwell Automation, Electronic Arts and Santander, among others.

- We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.

- We were named a Worldwide Leader in CX Improvement Services by IDC MarketScape report.

- We are a member of the Cybersecurity Tech Accord.

- At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

- Our ultimate Diversity & Inclusion goal is to make Globant a respectful, safe, and inclusive workplace for all Globers where gender equality, cultural diversity, and inclusion are core to our DNA. 


For more information, visit https://bit.ly/globant_com

Follow us:
